# sakura_iam_role (Data Source)

Get information about an existing IAM Role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_iam_role" "foobar" {
  id = "securitycontrol-agent"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the IAM Role.
- `name` (String) The name of the IAM Role.

### Read-Only

- `category` (String) The category of the IAM Role
- `description` (String) The description of the IAM Role.
